Pattern_Description: Regular, sustained firing with spike frequency adaptation. Maintains steady firing rate with gradual adaptation
Key_Characteristics: Spike frequency adaptation, broad spike width, accommodation
Functional_Role: Excitatory projection neurons, main cortical output

Pattern_Description: Initial burst of 2-5 spikes followed by regular single spikes. Mixed firing pattern
Key_Characteristics: Initial burst then tonic spiking, strong adaptation

Pattern_Description: Repetitive high-frequency bursts (>300Hz within burst) with stereotypical patterns
Key_Characteristics: Very high intraburst frequency, narrow spike width, repetitive bursts
Functional_Role: Contribute to gamma oscillations, visual cortex processing

Pattern_Description: High-frequency sustained firing without adaptation. Can fire up to 400Hz for seconds
Key_Characteristics: Very narrow spikes, no adaptation, high maximum firing rate
Functional_Role: Perisomatic inhibition, gamma rhythms, PV-positive basket cells

Pattern_Description: High-frequency firing with spike frequency adaptation. Rebound bursts after hyperpolarization
Key_Characteristics: Rebound bursts, T-type calcium currents, adaptation

Pattern_Description: Adapting spiking (ASP) or delayed non-adapting spiking (D.NASP)
Key_Characteristics: Place cell activity, theta modulation, complex spikes

Pattern_Description: Intrinsic bursting or adapting spiking patterns
Key_Characteristics: Recurrent connections, pattern completion, bursting

Pattern_Description: Very sparse, irregular firing with long silent periods
Key_Characteristics: Pattern separation, very low firing rates, sparse coding

Pattern_Description: High-frequency simple spikes (~40Hz) interrupted by complex spikes (~1Hz) followed by pause
Key_Characteristics: Two spike types, regular simple spikes, climbing fiber complex spikes
Functional_Role: Motor learning, cerebellar output, error correction

Pattern_Description: Sparse, irregular bursts of spikes in response to mossy fiber input
Key_Characteristics: Context-dependent firing, parallel fiber output, sparse activity

Pattern_Description: Tonic background firing with phasic burst responses to rewards/prediction errors
Key_Characteristics: Reward prediction error signaling, burst-pause patterns

Pattern_Description: Slow, regular tonic firing. Can burst up to 17Hz during certain behaviors
Key_Characteristics: Clock-like regularity, state-dependent modulation
Functional_Role: Mood regulation, sleep-wake cycles, behavioral state

Pattern_Description: Tonic firing with phasic responses to salient stimuli
Key_Characteristics: Attention-related bursts, arousal modulation

Pattern_Description: Tonic firing with characteristic pause-rebound responses to dopamine
Key_Characteristics: Pause-rebound firing, dopamine-responsive

Pattern_Description: Regular firing during voluntary movement, irregular spontaneous activity after SCI
Key_Characteristics: Size principle recruitment, persistent inward currents

Pattern_Description: Phasic ON or OFF responses, sustained responses, direction selectivity
Key_Characteristics: Light-responsive, center-surround organization, various subtypes
Functional_Role: Visual processing, motion detection, contrast detection

Pattern_Description: Sustained firing proportional to light intensity, melanopsin-based
Key_Characteristics: Intrinsic photosensitivity, irradiance detection

Pattern_Description: State-dependent: tonic during wake, bursting during sleep
Key_Characteristics: T-type Ca2+ channels, sleep spindles, state switching
Functional_Role: Sensory relay, sleep rhythms, attention gating

Pattern_Description: Rhythmic bursting synchronized with breathing pattern
Key_Characteristics: Central pattern generation, respiratory rhythm

Pattern_Description: Autonomous rhythmic firing without external input
Key_Characteristics: Intrinsic oscillations, clock-like regularity

Pattern_Description: Firing rate proportional to integrated input over time
Key_Characteristics: Input integration, memory of past inputs

Pattern_Description: Preferential response to specific input frequencies
Key_Characteristics: Frequency selectivity, subthreshold oscillations
